SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.controller.dashboard

Class AdminDashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.controller.dashboard.AdminDashboardController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminDashboardController extends Object
Controller responsible for the administrator dashboard and system management functions. This controller provides comprehensive system management capabilities including user management, gate operations oversight, and system monitoring. According to the system design, administrators have full access to all system functions.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminDashboardController

      public AdminDashboardController(UserService userService, GateOperationsService gateOperationsService, GateManagementService gateManagementService)
      Constructor injection of required services. The admin dashboard requires access to all major system services to provide comprehensive management capabilities.

  • Method Details

    • showDashboard

      @GetMapping("/dashboard") public String showDashboard(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays the main admin dashboard with system-wide statistics and management options. This method aggregates information from all services to provide a comprehensive overview of system status.

    • showGateManagement

      @GetMapping("/gates") public String showGateManagement(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the system-wide gate management interface. Provides administrators with full control over gate configuration and management.

    • showCreateGateForm

      @GetMapping("/gates/create") public String showCreateGateForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for creating a new gate. This provides the admin interface for adding new gates to the system.

    • createGate

      @PostMapping("/gates/create") public String createGate(@Valid @Valid GateModel gateModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the creation of a new gate. Administrators can create gates with full configuration options.

    • showAddUserForm

      @GetMapping("/users/add") public String showAddUserForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for adding a new user. This provides the admin interface for adding new users to the system.

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/users/add") public String addUser(@Valid @Valid UserModel userModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the addition of a new user. Administrators can add users with full configuration options.

    • showUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") public String showUsers(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the user management interface. Provides administrators with tools to manage system users.

    • showSystemHealth

      @GetMapping("/system-health") public String showSystemHealth(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays system health and monitoring information. Provides detailed system status and performance metrics.

    • deleteUser

      @PostMapping("/users/delete/{id}") public String deleteUser(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the deletion of a user. Administrators can delete users from the system.

    • showEditUserForm

      @GetMapping("/users/edit/{id}") public String showEditUserForm(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form for editing a user. This provides the admin interface for editing user details.

    • updateUser

      @PostMapping("/users/update/{id}") public String updateUser(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @Valid UserModel userModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the update of a user's details. Administrators can update user information.
